scripts.cc:start: f() { npm run cc:package; npm run cc:install; }; f
scripts.cc:upgrade: f() { npm run cc:package; hurl upgrade identities node $1  -P ./chaincode-identities; }; f
scripts.cc:package: f() { npm run lerna:build; chaincode-manager --config ./org1.identities.config.json --output ./chaincode-identities package; }; f
scripts.cc:install: f() { hurl install identities node -P ./chaincode-identities; }; f
